game.name: Train Simulator: Longhai Railway: Lingbao - Mianchi Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Started in 1905, and continued over the course of 50 years, the Longhai railway route from Simtech Vision is one of China’s busiest arterial links! Test it out now for a true taste of Chinese freight and passenger services…
game.shortDescriptionEn: Started in 1905, and continued over the course of 50 years, the Longhai railway route from Simtech Vision is one of China’s busiest arterial links! Test it out now for a true taste of Chinese freight and passenger services…
